label: 六道
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The six paths are the six forms in which a being may be reborn:  dweller in Hell (jigoku); hungry ghost (gaki); beast (chikushō); asura (shura); human being (ningen); and deva (ten) (p. 623 n.).  [地獄、餓鬼、畜生、修羅、人間、天]
